creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of Mr. and Mrs. George McKay Reid
description: Sculptural abstraction featuring an elliptical object that fills most of the picture plane; a circle in its center consists of interweaving lines that appear to gravitate inward; heavy black lines around the object's center spiral outwards towards its border
medium: Drypoint, aquatint, and lithograph; state proof
provenance: Vermillion Editions Limited, Minneapolis; Mr. and Mrs. George McKay Reid, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 1986.
title: Fold-Out
